About Me

A little bit about what I do

Your projects are in safe hands


Over 16 years’ experience in IT and a solid history in implementing IT solutions in the Engineering, Logistical, Manufacturing and Public Sectors including FTSE 100 companies. Conceptualised and managed full software development lifecycle projects ranging from £50k to £18m in budget and managed multiple teams up to 34 FTE. Coming from a technical background and backed by multiple Agile / Project Management certifications and years of experience, I am more than qualified to get the job done.

Certified Scrum Product Owner

Professional Scrum Master

Certified SAFe® Agilist

PRINCE2 Foundation

PRINCE2 Practitioner

PRINCE2 Agile Practioner

Agile Project Manager Foundation

Agile Project Manager Practitioner

Career Highlights

  • MMT Digital

    Technical Product Owner

    Uppingham, UK

    May 2021 – Present


    As an agency-side product owner, I am responsible for delivering digital products and services in an agile environment. The products vary from a range of digital web-based projects, including CMS implementations, web applications, e-commerce platforms, mobile apps and microsites for a range of clients.
    Currently working with our customer BP to deliver a large web app.

  • Platform Housing Group

    Product Owner

    Birmingham, UK

    Jan 2020 – May 2021


    Joined the organisation as part of an extensive digital transformation programme to move to Microsoft Azure and implement Microsoft Dynamics 365.
    Enabled the development team to manage their development portfolio harmoniously following Fortis and Waterloo's merge by implementing a development appraisal tool 'Proval' and 'Sequel' by SDS.
    Introduced Adobe Signature to enable the business to continue to operate during the pandemic and saved the business over £50k in Opex. Improved response time of contracts and documents sign off from up to 4 weeks down to 1 week.

  • Rolls Royce

    Project Manager / Product Owner

    Derby, UK

    Apr 2018 – Dec 2019


    Led an Engine Health Monitoring software development & migration project to Microsoft Azure Cloud using the Scaled Agile Framework as part of a large complex £18m Digital Twin programme involving over 120 FTE.
    Delivered a £2.5m Fleet Planning Tool software development Agile project, from inception through deployment. Managing 30+ developers, testers, data scientists, business analysts, solution architects and Scrum Masters, across 4 Scrum/Kanban teams in UK and India.
    Improved the UX/UI and increased forecasting capacity by 50 times, enabling scenario modelling capability.

  • Kuehne + Nagel

    Business Systems Project Manager

    Birmingham, UK

    Apr 2018 – Dec 2019


    Planned Waterfall-led implementations of SAP S/4HANA (ERP), SAP EWM and completed proof of concept. Secured successful sign-off and planned entire project lifecycle for £12m implementation of SAP S/4HANA solution.

  • JCB

    IT PROJECT MANAGER

    Rocester, Uttoxeter, UK

    Mar 2017–Oct 2017


    Implemented a Siemens Teamcenter 11 Product Lifecycle Management (PLM) Site consolidation (4-tier solution).
    Enabled a central repository for all PLM users avoiding duplication effort.
    Completed an automation project for accounts payable (600k invoices per annum into SAP via OpenText Optical Character Recognition). Cleared the ever-increasing invoice backlog; saved £100k+ OPEX for the business in headcount reduction.
    Rolled out a complete UK LAN upgrade, increasing business connectivity performance and bandwidth from 100MB/s to 1GB/s, improving network reliability and resiliency. Reduced number of outages and enabled implementation of future projects, including Ms Office 365.

  • Walsall Housing Group (whg)

    IT PROJECT MANAGER

    Walsall, UK

    Mar 2016–Aug 2016


    Co-managed IT Transformation Programme, overseeing implementation of new processes, introducing gated Waterfall approach (PRINCE2 methodology), standardising internal procedures and increasing efficiency.
    Managed and delivered an automated mobile solution (Xmbrace Dynamic Resource Scheduling and 1st Touch) reducing headcount in planning team and improving trades appointment allocation and distribution

  • Neovia Logistics

    IT Project Manager

    Desford, UK

    Feb 2014–Mar 2015


    Successfully managed $3m cloud transformation migration projects delivering time and cost-sensitive solutions in the EMEA region to Daimler, Mercedes, Bombardier, Harley Davidson, Jaguar Land Rover, Caterpillar, and Volkswagen.
    Completed 9 warehouse and office migrations on time and at cost in a politically challenging environment across Belgium, UK, France, Germany, Russian Federation, and UAE, successfully avoiding $3.3m per month penalty clauses.
